lead_paragraph: The Metropolitan Transportation Authority could award a contract as early as next year to build 10 of them, officials said, bringing to life an idea that has been debated for years.
snippet: The Metropolitan Transportation Authority could award a contract as early as next year to build 10 of them, officials said, bringing to life an idea that has been debated for years.

headline.main: Open Subway Cars May Come to New York City as Early as 2020
headline.print_headline: Open, Accordion-Style Subway Cars May Come to City’s System by 2020

abstract: Metropolitan Transportation Authority releases image of model of possible subway car redesign that uses open gangway plan, which could greatly expand rider capacity; image is part of presentation to authority board members and contract for new design could be awarded as early as 2017.
